thread.title: SA city listed as one of world's best
thread.title_full: SA city listed as one of world's best

author: Megan Ellis
title: SA city listed as one of world's best
text:
SA city listed as one of world's best Article By: Megan Ellis Wed, 21 Oct 2015 1:38 PM Share Your Email A sunset on Noordhoek beach. Credit: flickr.com/ Ryan Kilpatrick 
A South African city has been named among the world's best in Condé Nast Traveler's Readers' Choice Awards . And I think we all know which one it is... 
Yes, Cape Town can add another feather in its cap. 
Within the past year it has been named amongst the world's best food cities and the world's most beautiful cities. 
Now, it has placed in the 'Best Cities in the World' list. 
Cape Town ranked in 16th place on the list of 30 cities. Condé Nast readers gave it an overall rating of 83.806. 
Considering the fact that the number one city, Florence, received an overall rating of 86.529, Cape Town's rating is highly impressive. 
Cape Town beat out the likes of Amsterdam, Madrid, Singapore and Dublin. 
The top ten cities in the world on the list are: 1. Florence, Italy
